faqs.question: How do I get started with these Notion covers?
faqs.answer: After downloading the pack, save the cover images to your device or cloud storage. In any Notion page, click 'Add cover' at the top, then 'Upload' to select one of the designs. The images are pre-sized for Notion's cover dimensions and will look perfect immediately. Choose light versions for light mode or dark versions for dark mode to match your theme.

faqs.question: What's included in this cover pack?
faqs.answer: The Elegant Horizons pack includes 14 total cover images: seven unique nature-inspired landscape designs (Mountain, Forest, Waves, Animals, Flowers, Skyline, Sunrise), each available in both light and dark versions. All designs feature minimalist line art style with clean, sophisticated aesthetics optimized for Notion pages.

faqs.question: Can I use these covers across multiple pages and workspaces?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Once purchased, you can use these covers on unlimited Notion pages across all your workspaces. Mix and match different designs for various page types (use Mountain for work, Forest for personal, Waves for projects), reuse favorites across multiple pages, and apply them to personal and team workspaces without restrictions.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for this cover pack?
faqs.answer: Primary use cases include upgrading personal Notion dashboards with cohesive, professional aesthetics, creating visually appealing project or area pages in your second brain, building client-facing Notion pages that look polished and intentional, maintaining visual consistency across your workspace with a curated collection, easily switching covers to match light/dark mode preferences, and quickly elevating any Notion page from default to designed with one upload.
